message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
Let's try 55/45, Alice. It's more than fair considering the inflation!
This is a better offer than yours, Bob. Inflation is a factor, but so is fairness.
Inflation is hitting you harder, Alice. 58/42 is more than generous.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Inflation is taking its toll, Alice. 60/40 is the best I can do.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's settle this before we both lose out.
Time is running out, Alice. Inflation is crippling your share. 62/38 is my final offer.
